a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average performance of 15 year olds on the reading scale girls vs. boys, 2018
Assessed through the PISA reading scale, which is based on an OECD country mean of 500 points and a standard
PISA: Average mathematics score for boys
PISA: Average reading score for girls
Data source: OECD via World Bank (2023)
